Title: Eric S. Raymond: Ask Me Anything
Book Description: 'Ask ESR Anything.  What's he been working on? What's he shooting? What's he thinking about? What's he building in there?'

Title: Hot Sauce Families
Book Description: 'Capsicum-based hot sauces are not just about heat- but most people don't think about the other ingredients in their favorite brands.  Not all hot sauces are alike; they fall into distinct groups depending upon their major ingredients (other than hot peppers- vinegar- and water).  Join Eric and Cathy Raymond for a hot sauce tasting experience designed to teach you how to compare your favorites to new ones.  '

Title: CryptoParty: Penguicon Edition
Presenters: Susan Sons, Chris Nehren, Jeremy Banks, Eric S. Raymond, Paul Berens, Adam Nuwer, Andrew Kelley, John D. Bell
Book Description: 'Everyday encryption for the general public. Learn to protect your hard drive's data- browse the web anonymously- encrypt your email- and more in this hands-on workshop. Absolute beginners are welcome; we will have volunteers on hand to provide you with software and help you learn to use it. Bring your laptop along to get the most from hands-on activities in this session.'

Title: Guns and Gun Safety
Presenters: Stu Chisholm, Rob Reed, Eric S. Raymond, Richard Houser, Richard Herrell
Book Description: 'Author and gun enthusiast Stu Chisholm and author and NRA instructor Rob Reed talk about guns and gun safety.'
